title: M2M STD Reports Optimization & Enhancement
description:
Description
1. Epic Description
Epic (Requirement and Scope) 
An optimization or additional development for existing reports is currently delivered by the BI4BS team based on a new story in JIRA. 
Based on business needs it is required to change the logic in existing reports, add some new fields or adapt the existing ones. Changes are required to fix known issues, performance problems and improve usability.
Currently there is a new requirement for Standard reporting: 
New REMAINING_SUSPENSION_DAYS should be added  in 018_STD_SIM_BASICDATA report.
Customers want to have new column with Delivery note number in SIM Order information
Customers want to have 040_STD_INVOICE_DRILL_DOWN_LEVEL_01, 041_STD_INVOICE_DRILL_DOWN_LEVEL_02 reports translated to English.
Fix issue with NULL value for DASHBOARD ACTIVE_SIMS value
Add new column PERIOD into 074_STD_USAGE_BY_TYPE_AND_COUNTRY report.
Benefits:
Stable environment
Customer satisfaction.
Specific Deliverables  
Update of the Reporting user manual to reflect the changes in the reports and how to use new fields.
Documentation describing the changes in report logic and their impact on business processes, SSV updates.
Acceptance Criteria (conditions which must be satisfied for the Epic to be accepted)
REMAINING_SUSPENSION_DAYS is added  in 018_STD_SIM_BASICDATA report.
STD SIM Order report is enhanced with new Delivery note Number value
STD INVOICE Drill Down reports are translated to English
ACTIVE_SIMS in DASHBOARD is correctly displayed.
PEIOD is added to STD ARV USAGE_BY_TYPE_AND_COUNTRY
User Manual is updated.
Out of Scope
Creation of new reports, system architecture changes, or integration with new data sources. The focus is solely on updating existing columns with additional options or adding new column. Or translate columns name with the same content.
Dependencies 
 The mapping in the source system is clear and accessible, and the changes have been approved by a business side.
2. Technical / Solution Design / Compliance
Technical & Solution Design  
The proposed solution involves modifying existing reports to incorporate additional values for DELIVERY_NOTE_NUMBER information and update the logic accordingly. Also it is required to translate the existing values of Charges type in the Standard reporting. Fixing issue for Dashboard is also required for providing better service for Customers. This aligns with the architectural roadmap by ensuring compatibility with current systems and minimizing disruption. The implementation will utilize existing technologies and frameworks, with a focus on improving report performance while maintaining data integrity. The mapping in the source system is clear and accessible, ensuring a smooth integration process.

3. NFR (if any)
Non functional requirements
None.
  4. SLA(if any)
Service Level Agreements
Ensuring that modified reports are delivered within the agreed timeframe.
